website_summaries.verdict: Protects your fingers as you rifle through drawers, and protect your kitchen knives from damage and dulling.
pros: Blade stays secure thanks to embedded magnet
Wood material is solid, attractive Ash
Can accommodate various knife lengths, though width shouldn't exceed one inch
cons: The fit is not customized to a particular knife

customer_reviews.title: Its useless. If you want a sleeve, buy the regular cangshan sleeves. No magnet. They work great.
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculous. I figured the magnet would simple help your knife nestle into the sleeve. It does that, but also the magnet is so powerful the entire sleeve get stuck onto anything metal. Also, the magnet is so powerful that it broke the glue that holds the magnet onto the sleeve itself. I'm constantly fighting this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Zia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Way too strong of a magnet. Scratched my miyabi black 8 inch chef knife. This would be a great product if they lined it with felt and had a lesser strength magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I recently bought the pairing knife that came with a sheath, it was awesome. Decided the extend that awesomeness to my chefs knife that did not have a sheath. Fits perfect. No issues at all. Def recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: JAMES

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but with some flaw
customer_reviews.text: For a sheath that’s $20 more, this product does not meet my expectations, and has worse quality than general Japanese product in my mind. Despite pretty pictures in the page, the wood they used isn’t good quality piece. And the sheath is extremely light. All these details make it only an OK knife sheath, but far from a nice one.
customer_reviews.author: Haodong Liu

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and functions well.
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but the magnet fell off after a week. I super glued it back on but it seemed to be on the cheaper side. The magnet is strong, maybe too strong. Not a bad product but it works and it looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: My thoughts
customer_reviews.text: Better product if they would use hard wood & 2 magnets. Using only 1 magnet the knife can rotate out of the sheath. Fixed this by slicing/ gluing a wine cork where the tip of the knife is & the bolster.
customer_reviews.author: oz

customer_reviews.title: functional but...
customer_reviews.text: these are well made but the magnet is so super strong if you store this in a draw with any other knives, they instantly clang to the sheaf. This sheaf is only practical if you plan to store it in a draw or place with no other unsecured metal objects.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great design, nice wood and strong magnet... just wish there were two magnets to keep the sheath level rather than sagging on the handle end when mounted to a metal vertical surface.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was terrible. It came with the magnet separated and didn’t fit the chefs knife I bought it for. It was also poor quality wood and is really unstable.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Williams

customer_reviews.title: Holds my knife nicely on the fridge.
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping my knife handy but out of the way!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for professional setting
customer_reviews.text: First time I put it down on a metal table the magnet came out I do not recommend find a saya that fits
customer_reviews.author: austin pandza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nice easy way to guard my knife. Fits my 8 inch perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Great way to protect your Knives and maintain a razor sharp edge
customer_reviews.author: Erickson B. Acacio

customer_reviews.title: and the work is a nice quality wood and a lot thinker than I thought ...
customer_reviews.text: Theagnet is very stromg, and the work is a nice quality wood and a lot thinker than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Sheath damaged Knife
customer_reviews.text: Sheath seems solid enough, if not a little lighter then i'd expect. However, i bought this sheath for my Shun Chef knife, as some users have suggested it would fit, and while the knife fits in the sheath, it scratched up the side of my blade. My knife now has 3 deep scratches in it that catch food when i cut. Huge disappointment. I contacted the company, which claimed their sheath couldn't do this, however i watched it happen to my blade twice. I wanted to like this sheath, but i can't believe the damage it's done and the lack of caring by the corporate staff.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Magnet too strong for the glue
customer_reviews.text: Less than a year of use and the magnet was too strong that it separated from the wood.
customer_reviews.author: tonics

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Looks: 5/5 - very modern cut/shape and made from real wood. The shape allows your knife to still shine while sheathed. Magnet strength: 5/5 - slide the knife in carfully because this magnet is nice and strong! Size: 5/5 - fits my 8 inch Shun perfectly. Functionality: 4.5/5 - the magnet on the back can stick to other items when placed in a drawer, but it works great if you plan on displaying your knife.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding knife sheath.
customer_reviews.text: Almost passed on this item due to some negative reviews but thought I'd give it a try. I liked the design and the wood. I purchased this for a new carbon steel Kramer by Zwilling 8" chefs knife that was too thick for my knife block. Love it. The knife fits perfectly. No magnet problems. Be sure to read the very specific instructions on the guard. It is really very well thought out.
customer_reviews.author: caffeinated

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Shun Hikari 8" Chef's knife. Magnet is a solid balance of strength.
customer_reviews.text: I own an 8-inch Shun chef's knife and it fits PERFECTLY into the block. The magnetic is strong on the back so I can actually put the block on the side if my fridge to store it and the magnet is the right strength to hold the knife without being so powerful it could harm the blade. I wouldn't suggest using this as a travel block; keep it in the kitchen and you won't have any issues!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great sheath
customer_reviews.text: I opted for this because I like the company and it looks quite nice. I bought this for a different brand but the size is proper and fits well. Likely would fit most any 8 in chef knife. The magnet seems well attached. Some reviews suggest it likes to fall off. If that were to happen a dab of gorilla glue would fix that permanently. Great so far!
customer_reviews.author: D Boy Flex

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one....
customer_reviews.text: Magnet is way too strong for the saya, wood broke after 1 month use. Always getting stuck on things...
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It looks great on my Shun. For those complaining about magnet strength, don't store it in a drawer with other utensils
customer_reviews.author: matt rose

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Fits my knife well but the magnet is almost too strong and the finish on the wood leaves something to be desired
customer_reviews.author: teddy

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. It's easy to slide your knife in without touching the blade edge to the wood. One note: if you plan to put this in a drawer with other eating utensils the magnet will attract them so be ready to clear a metal free area.
customer_reviews.author: Jason, S

customer_reviews.title: Strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: Had to glue the magnet back in but it's all good now
customer_reviews.author: Jenlunew

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Magnet fail off easy all ready crack !! No worth the money
customer_reviews.author: miguel gonzalez

product_meta.title: Cangshan 1021462 Solid Ash Wood Magnetic ANCHOR Knife Sheath Only for 8-Inch Chef's Knife
feature_bullets: Patent pending design focuses on unique and functional sheaths distinctly beautiful
Each sheath is crafted from a solid piece of Ash wood with gorgeous grain
Special carbonized wood makes the sheath more durable also ensures all natural with no glue, stain or resin
A embedded copper toned magnet makes the sheath stylish and safely secures the knife blade during storage
Works with all Cangshan Knife Series 8-inch chef's knife

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars65 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
